intro_step1.label: Step 1: Download the "SMSSync" app from the Android Market.
intro_step1.description: Scan this QR Code with your phone to download the app from the Android Market

intro_step2.label: Step 2: Android App Settings
intro_step2.description: Turn on SMSSync and use the following link as the Sync URL: http://ushv3.dev/smssync

secret.label: Secret
secret.description: Set a secret so that only authorized SMSSync devices can send/recieve message. You need to configure the same secret in the SMSSync App.
